tuts:
• Realms enchant (1.4)
1) Enchant item
2) Place in crafting table
3) Exit table.

• Realms give (1.4)
1) Open player category
2) Choose <set offhand>
3) Give the item
4) Put offhand item in hotbar.

• Bypass IP ban
1) Search VPN in playstore
2) Choose most downloaded
3) Turn it on.

• Bypass device ban
1) MCPE storage to external
2) Open other category
3) Tap delete CID.

• Vote more daily
1) Search VPN in playstore
2) Choose most downloaded
3) Turn it on
4) Vote with random name
5) Change device date
6) Change VPN region
7) Repeat to vote more.

• Delete PG chests
1) Use bucket of water
2) Place water on same block
the chest is on/under chest
3) Pick up chest & water.

• Get inside HCF bases
1) Open world category
2) Choose nullify doors/gates
3) Walk through gates.
